title: Election security top priority for U.S.: DHS chief
text:
Election security top priority for U.S.: DHS chief Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:26 
The U.S. Department of Homeland Security is prioritizing election cyber security above all other critical infrastructure it protects, the agency's chief said on Wednesday, just months ahead of the November midterm elections. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
